title: Life is for living
creator_contributor_role: Guide Dog Association of Victoria, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Blindness
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Physically handicapped
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Blind orientation and mobility
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped - Care and treatment
description: Blindness is not such a great problem when you learn to overcome it. Some of the ways to do this are through the use of guide dogs, canes or sonic guides; other senses must be utilised to the full. The film also shows blind people leading normal lives and makes suggestions for fund raising.
